Response Type: Multiple types of questions can be combined in a single component.
DV: Variable by question type. See each [questionnaire type](#quest_types) for more information.

Response Type: Multiple questions asked across a single radio button response scale
DV: Numeric value which is not seen by participants that corresponds to text labels which are seen by participants. Can incorporate automatic reverse-scoring.

Response Type: A list of options which are dragged into relative rank order by participants.
DV: Rank position assigned by participants of the various items.
